context.p: Create a new Request within the CM-Portal.

info.p: Click the Requests link in the navigation bar.
Click the Create new Request button.
Enter the details as shown below.
NOTE: Any restrictions on the fields are outlined.

ul.li: Program: Must be an existing Program.
Schema: Must be an existing Schema.
Content: Fill required fields from a selected Schema.

info.p: Click the Save button, the Request will be created, and the user will be redirected back to the view page for the newly created Request.
NOTE: Request will not save if any fields are invalid (invalid fields are highlighted in red).

result.p: A New Request is created in the CM-Portal.
A New Jira is created for the Request.
